And my favorite Jobs-Noyce story takes place in probably the early 1980s and Bob had a plane called a Seabee that could land on water or land on land and he wanted to show it off to Steve Jobs.

They started to fly up to Lake Tahoe and Noyce stopped at an intermediate lake, showed, `Oh, look, it lands on water,' and they took back off, and were--without either of them knowing it--Noyce inadvertently locked the wheels into water-landing position, and when they went to land on the ground, the plane almost flipped.
